Summary: Biochemical reaction from atazanavir to atazanavir M2. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.

Biochemical reaction from atazanavir to atazanavir M1. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from atazanavir to atazanavir M5. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.
Biochemical reaction from atazanavir to atazanavir M3. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5 or CYP3A4.
